overview: Steinar J. Engelsen joined Teknoinvest AS in 1996. Prior to joining Teknoinvest, Dr. Engelsen was Senior Vice President R&D, Nycomed Pharma, with responsibility for research, pre-clinical and clinical development and medical affairs. The main R&D units were located in Austria, Denmark, Germany and Norway. He was Research Associate at the Department of Chemistry, and at the University Hospital at the University of Oslo after concluding his internship in medicine. Dr. Engelsen currently serves as Member of the Board of Directors of Capnia Inc. (USA) and Affitech AS (Norway). Dr. Engelsen is fluent in Norwegian, English and German. He is certified European Financial Analyst (AFA) from the Norwegian School of Economics and Business Administration (“HandelshÃ¸yskolen”), and holds an M.Sc. in Nuclear Chemistry in addition to being an accredited M.D. (both from the University of Oslo).
